id.name: Grafika Komputer
id.description: Pembuatan image, framebuffer, primitif dari penggambaran objek, algoritma Bresenham, transformasi geometri, window-view, layering, clipping, object filling, optimasi anti-clipping, struktur data spatial, pemodelan hierarki, kurva Bezier & Spline
id.syllabus: Pembuatan image, framebuffer, primitif dari penggambaran objek, algoritma Bresenham, transformasi geometri, window-view, layering, clipping, object filling, optimasi anti-clipping, struktur data spatial, pemodelan hierarki, kurva Bezier & Spline
id.outcomes: Memahami bagaimana gambar dibuat di komputerMampu menerapkan teknik pemodelan dan pemrosesan gambarMampu mengembangkan aplikasi komputer yang memanfaatkan pemrosesan gambar

en.name: Computer Graphics
en.description: Image creation, framebuffer, primitive object drawing, Bresenham algorithm, Geometry Transformation, window-view, layering, clipping, object filling, anti-clipping optimization, spatial data structure, hierarchical modeling,  Bezier & Spline curve
en.syllabus: Image creation, framebuffer, primitive object drawing, Bresenham algorithm, Geometry Transformation, window-view, layering, clipping, object filling, anti-clipping optimization, spatial data structure, hierarchical modeling,  Bezier & Spline curve
en.outcomes: Understand how the image is created in a computerAble to implement modeling techniques and image processingAble to develop computer application that utilize image processing
